document_data.mainbody: '''Moon domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers related to [[Selûne (moon)|the moon]], perception, and [[lycanthrope]]s.
document_data.Powers: The spellcaster gained the ability to [[turn undead|turn and destroy]] lycanthropes as a good cleric would turn undead.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[faerie fire]]'', ''[[moonbeam]]'', and ''[[moon blade]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[good hope]]'',<ref group="note">In v.3.5, this spell replaced the ''[[emotion]]'' spell. See page 88 of ''Player's Guide to Faerûn''. ''[[moon path]]'', and ''[[permanent image]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[insanity]]'', ''[[animal shapes]]'', and ''[[moonfire (spell)|moonfire]]''.
